citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
There are expired medications not labeled and stored with the unexpired medications including a bottle of Vitamin B12
(exp 5/24), 2 bottles of SMZ-TMP liquid (exp 6/30/2025), a tube of Renal K+ (1/2025) and a tube of Silver Honey (exp
10/2024). These were stored with other drugs currently being used. The use of expired medications are not considered to
be a safe or appropriate method to prevent, control, diagnose, and treat diseases and injuries since the expected results
cannot be guaranteed. The facility must ensure the use of appropriate methods to prevent, control, diagnose, and treat
diseases and injuries. The licensee must ensure all medications used in regulated animals are not expired.
To be corrected by September 16, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
There are expired medications not labeled and stored with the unexpired medications including a bottle of Vitamin B12 
(exp 5/24), 2 bottles of SMZ-TMP liquid (exp 6/30/2025), a tube of Renal K+ (1/2025) and a tube of Silver Honey (exp 
10/2024). These were stored with other drugs currently being used. The use of expired medications are not considered to 
be a safe or appropriate method to prevent, control, diagnose, and treat diseases and injuries since the expected results 
cannot be guaranteed. The facility must ensure the use of appropriate methods to prevent, control, diagnose, and treat 
diseases and injuries. The licensee must ensure all medications used in regulated animals are not expired.  
To be corrected by September 16, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
